name: VAUBAN
description: In an ever-globalizing world, where individuals and corporates have interests on a cross-continental basis, a digital-first, progressive approach is needed to manage this. VAUBAN is allows emerging fund managers, entrepreneurs, family offices, and institutional investors to quickly launch and manage asset-holding entities such as Hedge Funds, Venture Capital, SPVs and Real Estate Funds.

jobs.title: Alternative Investment Associate
jobs.description:
# The Company:

VAUBAN is a wealth container platform allowing emerging fund managers, entrepreneurs, family offices, and institutional investors to quickly launch and manage asset-holding entities such as Hedge Funds, Venture Capital, SPVs and Real Estate Funds. At Vauban, you will work on complex unique finance transactions. 

# What you’ll be doing:

We are looking for an Associate to work in the operations team. You will be in charge of the relationship with fund managers and the creation of investment vehicles. You will be the primary contact for related clients and investors.

Duties include:
* Coordinate deal completion
* Manage the client's onboarding
* Liaise with tax specialists, lawyers, bankers, brokers and notaries
* Solve complex problems
* Work with the product and tech team to automate wealth container formation


The position is now open to hardworking, highly organized self-starters comfortable in a fast-paced environment.

# You will need:

* A passion for helping our clients succeed
* An ability to drive multiple accounts simultaneously, each at different stages, to plan, organize and complete work assignments in a timely and accurate manner
* Strong attention to detail, even under pressure
* An attraction for the alternative investment industry
  

# What we can offer you:

* Opportunity to be an early joiner in a rapidly growing company with responsibility from week one
* Central London office in WeWork
* Salary £35,000 - £50,000 + equity


Feel free to apply even if you feel like you don’t fully match the description above.

Please do apply by emailing us at jobs@vauban.io and tell us about an operational challenge that you solved in your previous experiences.

jobs.title: Legal Engineer
jobs.description:
LEGAL ENGINEER AT VAUBAN.IO


For this hybrid role, you will most likely have a Law background, a strong love for technology, and a willingness to promote automation in the Legal Industry.


# The Company:

VAUBAN is a wealth container platform allowing emerging fund managers, entrepreneurs, family offices, and institutional investors to quickly launch and manage asset-holding entities such as Hedge Funds, Venture Capital, SPVs and Real Estate Funds. At Vauban, you will work on complex unique finance transactions. 


# What you’ll be doing:

We are looking for a dynamic legal engineer to animate legal engineering workshop & meetups with lawyers. You will be teaching them how to use AI to automate the drafting of complex documents. 

You will also work with the tech team to automate as much as possible the different legal processes and the generation of legal documents (Term Sheet, , Private Placement Memorandum, Articles of Association, Limited Partnership Agreement etc.)

The position is now open to hardworking, highly organized self-starters comfortable in a fast-paced environment.

# You will need:

* A willingness to transform the legal industry
* Experience in a Legal or Legal Operations environment, most likely a corporate law firm
* Experience drafting legal documents in a common law environment
* Strong attention to detail, even under pressure
* You will most likely hold a degree in Corporate Law, but we're open to anything.


 # What we can offer you:

* Opportunity to be an early joiner in a rapidly growing company with responsibility from week one
* Central London office in WeWork
* Salary £40,000 - £60,000 + equity


Feel free to apply even if you feel like you don’t fully match the description above.

Please do apply by emailing us at jobs@vauban.io and tell us about a legal document that you think should be automated.

jobs.title: Front-end Engineer
jobs.description:
VAUBAN is an investment funds architect platform allowing emerging fund managers, venture capitals, traders, angel investors, entrepreneurs, family offices, and institutional investors to quickly launch and manage Hedge Funds, Venture Capital, SPVs and Real Estate Funds.

We are building the next-generation platform for funds and wealth containers: The AWS of the investment vehicle industry.

# Our tech stack:
- Linux (Arch Linux)
- VueJs
- Express / NestJs (NuxtJS)
- TypeORM
- Postgres
- Docker
- Gitlab
- Heroku

# What you’ll be doing: 

- Develop new features in collaboration with other team members, in order to meet fund managers’ and investors’ requirements
- Extend the Vauban Front-End Framework with your ideas
- Automate the generation of legal documents (100+ pages) & contracts
- Work with the product team to improve the onboarding system for investors
- Take ownership and ensure your work is tested and functional


# You will need:

- JavaScript and OOP with TypeScript
- RESTful APIs made in Express/NestJs
- CRUD request in SQL
- source code versioning with git
- testing (unit testing + end to end testing)
- UI design is a bonus

# What we can offer you:

* Opportunity to be an early joiner in a rapidly growing company with responsibility from week one
* Central London office in WeWork
* Salary £50,000 - £60,000 + equity

Feel free to apply even if you feel like you don’t fully match the description above.

Please do apply by emailing us at jobs@vauban.io and tell us about a challenge that you solved in your previous experiences.

jobs.title: Investment Vehicle Analyst
jobs.description:
# The Company:

VAUBAN is a wealth container platform allowing emerging fund managers, entrepreneurs, family offices, and institutional investors to quickly launch and manage asset-holding entities such as Hedge Funds, Venture Capital, SPVs and Real Estate Funds. At Vauban, you will work on complex unique finance transactions. 

# What you’ll be doing:

We are looking for a dynamic professional with knowledge of financial instruments who can provide world-class support to our clients while helping us pushing further the digitization and the automation of our fund services.

The position is now open to hardworking, highly organized self-starters comfortable in a fast-paced environment.

You will be performing fund administration tasks such as:

1. Hedge Fund / VC Accounting

* Manage the client's onboarding
* Process subscriptions and redemption of the fund
* Produce the NAV of the funds
* Prepare annual financial statements
* Prepare quarterly management accounts
* Constantly review and enhance fund administration and NAV calculation processes and verification methods
* Provide Audit support

2. Products Improvements

* Enhancement of our NAV checklist and our fund accounting processes
* You will be expected to proactively suggest and lead product improvements in our next-gen fund services.
* You will be working closely with the tech team to implement improvements and pave the way towards automated fund administration.
* Participate in product improvements and general corporate development
The position is now open to hardworking, highly organized self-starters comfortable in a fast-paced environment.

3. Technology 

* Data Manipulation. You will be helping with data integration from various platforms to our system, including connecting, transforming and loading flows of data.

# You will need:

* Good knowledge of accounting principles
* Extensive financial culture
* An attraction for the alternative investment industry
* Advanced Excel (pivot tables, macros)
* An ability to drive multiple accounts simultaneously, each at different stages, to plan, organize and complete work assignments in a timely and accurate manner
* Strong attention to detail, even under pressure
* Data engineering skills not mandatory but desirable, including ETL, Data Pipeline

PS: An affinity with crypto markets is a plus (We have a lot of clients who are crypto hedge funds)


# What we can offer you:

* Opportunity to be an early joiner in a rapidly growing company with responsibility from week one
* Interact with talented hedge fund managers from day one
* Central London office in WeWork
* Salary £35,000 - £50,000 + equity


Feel free to apply even if you feel like you don’t fully match the description above.

Please do apply by emailing us at careers@vauban.io and tell us about an accounting challenge that you solved in your previous experiences.

jobs.title: Right-Hand Wo/Man to the Management
jobs.description:
# The Company:

Vauban is the home of modern deal-makers: It lets you set-up, deploy and manage your Funds and SPVs from a laptop in minutes.

Founded in London in 2017, VAUBAN is an online platform that lets its clients’ set-up various investment vehicles such as funds and SPVs digitally. From initial set-up to administration, VAUBAN focuses on providing a service which is fast, digital and transparent.

Particularly popular with emerging VC and Hedge Fund Managers, more than 60 Fund Managers and Venture Capitalists rely on VAUBAN to set-up, deploy and maintain their Funds and SPVs.




# What you’ll be doing:

We are looking for a right hand man or woman to assist the top management with HR and operational matters.

*HR: Write Job Ads, Maintain ATS, Draft Scorecards, organise tests, assist with the first round of interviews, maintaining compliance with the Home Office in regards to sponsored staff

*Accounting: Liaise with our Accountants on various matters, assist with reconciliations

*Invoicing and Payments: Assist with issuing invoices, payment of invoices and bills and other bookkeeping matters

*Board Secretary: Assist with the preparation of Board Meeting Agenda and the writing of Board Minutes




# What you need:

*Strong attention to detail, even under pressure

*A good understanding of HR procedures and hiring processes

*A general knowledge of accounting principles

*An strong appetite for changing the industry through technology

*An ability to organise complex projects and deliver on time

*Strong interpersonal skills



# What we can offer you:



*Opportunity to join a rocket-ship before it takes off: Vauban is one of the fastest growing LegalTech/FinTech startup in the UK and it just received VC funding

*Opportunity to work in an amazing atmosphere

*Learn how to build and run a company

*Competitive Package


Please apply here: https://jobs.gohire.io/vauban-xukc2nid/right-hand-wo-man-to-the-management-23505/
